titles: The Discontented Lady: a new song much in request. To a new tune much in request at court and the play-house.
publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Bates, at the White Hsrt in West-smithfield.,
notes: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "How vile are the sordid intreagues of the town ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
